docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: mkdocs
docs.text:
• 从头教你用mkdocs构建个人博客系统: blog.csdn.net.
  • My notes: local网址, public网址.
  • 本地文件存放目录为C:\Users\chaofu\ChaoNotes, 对应于GitHub仓库为：
    • 源文档存放在master分支
    • site目录下的文档存放在gh-pages分支，用于部署
  • 如何更新笔记：
    • Step1: 部署 C:\Users\chaofu\ChaoNotes> python -m mkdocs gh-deploy
    • Step2: 存档 C:\Users\chaofu\ChaoNotes> git add ./git commit -m "commit message"/git push
